.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetRenderAreaGranularity-device-parameter]] pname:device must: be a valid sname:VkDevice handle
* [[VUID-vkGetRenderAreaGranularity-renderPass-parameter]] pname:renderPass must: be a valid sname:VkRenderPass handle
* [[VUID-vkGetRenderAreaGranularity-pGranularity-parameter]] pname:pGranularity must: be a valid pointer to a sname:VkExtent2D structure
* [[VUID-vkGetRenderAreaGranularity-renderPass-parent]] pname:renderPass must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from pname:device
****
